LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_DemandModifier: Each trader has a random demand for each item.\nDefault value: 0.4
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_DemandHintThreshold: Minimum trader demand for a good to show colored hint on trading screen.\nDefault value: 0.25
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_DemandPriceTypeThreshold: Maximum trader price type modifier value at which demand modifier became 0. Intermediate values are interpolated.\nDefault value: 0.5
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_noSellCap: Normally sell-prices are capped to the buy-price, checking this box will remove this limit. Just dont abuse it :)
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_invertedColors: Checking this will invert the colors for bargains, switching the red and green around
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_ShowAdvanced: This will allow to modify vanilla trading price calculation.
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_MinimalPrice: Minimal price for buying. Minimal price for selling is multiplied by 0.02.\nDefault value: 0.5
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_NegotiatorBonus: Negotiator bonus for a colonist with max Social skill.\nDefault value: 0.3
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_FactionBaseBonus: Trading with faction base bonus.\nDefault value: 0.02
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_SellPriceFactorBias: Sell price factor bias. Sell price factor multiplier equal to: (sellPriceFactor + bias) x effect.\nDefault value: 0
LanguageData.BT_SettingDesc_SellPriceFactorMultEff: Sell price factor multiplier effect. Sell price factor multiplier equal to: (sellPriceFactor + bias) x effect.\nDefault value: 1
